groups.name: rag
groups.description: Configuration properties for Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).

properties.name: rag.top-k
properties.description: Number of most similar document chunks to retrieve for context. Higher values provide more context but may include less relevant information.

properties.name: rag.similarity-threshold
properties.description: Minimum similarity score (0.0-1.0) for retrieved documents. Documents below this threshold are filtered out. Higher values ensure more relevant results but may exclude useful context.

properties.name: rag.classpath-file
properties.description: Classpath resource file containing documents to ingest (e.g., '1998-1999.txt').

values.description: Conservative - fewer but more relevant results
Comprehensive - more context, may include less relevant results
